forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. Rain, heavy at times in the morning. High 13C. Winds SE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy, rain heavy at times this morning. Thunderstorms developing by evening. High around 55F. Winds SE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain. Thunderstorms possible...mainly overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Locally heavier rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thunderstorms likely. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Locally heavier rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds SW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 43F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. High around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the evening, then cloudy with rain likely overnight. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers during the evening giving way to periods of light rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 48F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 4C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 40F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High around 10C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High near 50F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low around 40F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 11C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 52F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 40F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 52F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 9C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 48F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 4C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low around 40F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High near 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 39F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 50F. NE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low near 5C. NNW winds shifting to ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
